build --action_env PYTHON_BIN_PATH="/ccs/home/shubhankar/miniconda3/envs/tensorflow/bin/python"
build --action_env PYTHON_LIB_PATH="/ccs/home/shubhankar/miniconda3/envs/tensorflow/lib/python3.5/site-packages"
build --python_path="/ccs/home/shubhankar/miniconda3/envs/tensorflow/bin/python"
build --define with_jemalloc=true
build:gcp --define with_gcp_support=true
build:hdfs --define with_hdfs_support=true
build:s3 --define with_s3_support=true
build:kafka --define with_kafka_support=true

build:gdr --define with_gdr_support=true

build --action_env TF_CUDA_VERSION="8.0"
build --action_env CUDNN_INSTALL_PATH="/autofs/nccs-svm1_home1/shubhankar/libcudnn7_7.0.3.11-1+cuda8.0_ppc64el/lib/powerpc64le-linux-gnu"
build --action_env TF_CUDNN_VERSION="7"
build --action_env TF_NCCL_VERSION="1"
build --action_env TF_CUDA_COMPUTE_CAPABILITIES="3.5,5.2"
